name: Ayush Anti Pimple Turmeric Face Wash
description: Anti Pimple Face Wash with Turmeric - Cure skin infections & rashes. For clean & spotless fair skin. Contains goodness of Turmeric & Nalpamaradi Tailam. Turmeric (Haldi) is prescribed in Ayurveda for purification and also well known for its antiseptic and healing properties. Nalpamaradi Tailam cures skin infections & rashes, leaving your skin clear and glowing. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
